description: Cam Christou"The Cannon"Ht: 5'10"Wt: 170lbsSeason W/L Record (0-1)Luke Adams"The Atom Bomb"Ht: 5'7"Wt: 165lbsSeason W/L Record (0-0) Two hot studs with their asses on the line, in the red trunks we have Cam "The Cannon" Christou returning after losing his first match against Chris "Mr Badass" Bines. Fighting in the blue trunks is hot newcomer Luke "The Atom Bomb" Adams. Atom Bomb has made sure to study a few NK fights in preparation for this week's bout, and he can't wait to dominate his opponent and shove Cannon's face into the mat as he's fucking him from behind. Cannon on the other hand plans on shutting his opponent up and using him as his own personal fuck doll before covering Atom Bomb's face with cum. Find out who's ass gets fucked after three grueling rounds!
title: Cam "The Cannon" Christou vs Luke "The Atom Bomb" Adams
